TopicTitle: Teleported to the void when craft touches the ground

Articles.Content:
Every time when i launch a craft, the camera breaks and all i see is space, sometimes when i switch to IVA, the camera gets fixed for a moment then gets black again, and all the log says is "[Log]: Look rotation viewing vector is zero" and revert flight button also fails

all the log says is "[Log]: Look rotation viewing vector is zero"

My modlist is:Adjustable landing gear,asteroid day mod,b9 proc wings,bd armory,CIT plugin,docking tube for KAS,KAS,KIS,KAX,Quiz Tech Aero, firespitter,hotspot,hullcam vds,P.E.W,Scramjet mod,KER,Mini airbrakes,IR,model rework,EVA chutes,EVA follower,RPM,north kerbin weaponry,stockalike station parts and planetary base inc

I sometimes get this bug too, I remember getting it every now and again in an unmodded 1.0.0 install. I think it's a stock issue, but in case it's not, I'll add what mods I also use:

Asteroid Day, KAS, KIS, KER, Infernal Robotics, RPM, Planetary Base parts.
It ruins the tracking station too

I do vaguely remember 'fixing' it by messing with the IVA, and I managed to land on Ike while the debug log was spamming that look rotation line, and when I went back to the KSC, it looked like Kerbin suffered from a terrible earthquake, all the ground was spiking up at 90 degree angles.

I'll mess around with my stock install to see if this got fixed in 1.0.1+, if I can't get it to happen then it must be a mod causing it. It'll be difficult to replicate though, since it seems to happen randomly.
yep, sometimes IVA 'fixes' it, but then it starts flashing the black screen again

KSP, y dont u auto-fix

Exiting out of the game (without saving beforehand) generally fixes it properly for me. Don't try reloading your save without exiting the game first as the problem still persists and could potentially corrupt it.
